name: Family Tree Maker for DOS Backup File
summary: Learn about .FBC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: Family Tree Maker for DOS uses the ".fbc" file extension, while Family Tree Maker for Windows saves backups as .FBK files. Family Tree Maker version 16 or earlier can open FBC files.

description: Compressed backup of a family tree (.FTM) file created with Family Tree Maker for DOS; created as a backup in case the original family tree file is lost or damaged; can be restored by selecting "Fileâ†’Restore From Backup" within Family Tree Maker.
